overview: "Slavic Values" is the first English-language concert by Evgeny Chebatkov, recorded in the fall of 2021. The unexpected combination of the brilliant imperial hall of the Pushkin Theater (which, by the way, was only half-filled due to the pandemic) and Evgeny in a classic Adidas tracksuit with three stripes immediately demonstrates the duality of everything happening. A Russian guy in Moscow performing in English... for whom? For you, of course.
title: Evgeny Chebatkov: Slavic Values
